actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week of June 17, 1974, as "National Right of Way Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week of June 17, 1974, as "National Right-of-Way Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week of June 17, 1974, as "National Right of Way Week".
